#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
   long t,n,s;

   scanf("%ld",&t);

   while(t--)
   {

     scanf("%ld",&n);

     if((n-1)%2==0)

     s=(n*n-1)/4;

     else s=n*n/4;

     printf("%ld\n",s);

   }

   return 0;

}
